contentrichtext.text: '''Felicjan Szczesny Kowarski''' (8 November 1890–22 September 1948) was a [[Polish painter]] and [[sculpture|sculptor]], known mostly from his monumental wall paintings and plafonds (e.g. plafond in the ''Hall under the Birds'' at castle of Wawel). ==See also== * [[Jan Betley]] ==External links== *[http://malarze.com/artysta.php?id=221 Felicjan Kowarski's gallery at malarze.com] {{Authority control|VIAF=35927283}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Kowarski, Felicjan | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Polish artist | DATE OF BIRTH = 8 November 1890 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = 22 September 1948 | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Kowarski, Felicjan}} [[Category:1890 births]] [[Category:1948 deaths]] [[Category:Polish painters]] [[Category:Polish sculptors]] {{Poland-painter-stub}} {{Poland-sculptor-stub}}
